thread.title: WATCH: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend’s Daughter Says ‘Cat’ for the First Time
thread.title_full: WATCH: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend’s Daughter Says ‘Cat’ for the First Time

author: Celebuzz
title: WATCH: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend’s Daughter Says ‘Cat’ for the First Time
text:
MORE >> 
Luna Stephens is already learning her first words. 
While vacationing in Morocco, the 11-month-old showed off her growing vocabulary by saying “cat” for the first time. Proud mama Chrissy Teigen gushed about the milestone on her Instagram, sharing a video of the adorable moment. 
“What is that?” the mom-of-one asked Luna, pointing to a feline sitting in an outdoor courtyard during the family lunch. 
After papa John Legend repeated the word “cat,” the tiny tot caught on and mimicked her parents’ speech. A post shared by chrissy teigen (@chrissyteigen) on Mar 20, 2017 at 6:38am PDT 
“Ah!!! So many firsts,” Teigen captioned the clip, which had garnered more than 2 million views in just five hours. 
However, that wasn’t Luna’s only first time learning about a furry friend. Just last week, Luna was able to come face-to-face with a live rabbit when her parents set up a temporary petting zoo in their backyard. 
“Gentle, gentle,” Teigen cooed as she carried her daughter to pet a bunny. After touching the creature’s fur, Luna started smiling and continued to pet the animal. 
How cute! 
Mar 14, 2017 at 11:43am PDT Advertisement
